ui.customnotebutton.title: ui.customnotebutton.limit_text
Add a Custom Note: You can delete existing notes to make room for more.
添加自定记录: 你可以删除已有的记录以为新的记录腾出空间。

ui.customnotebutton.title: ui.customnotebutton.desc
Add a Custom Note: Custom Notes let you record anything you'd like in the journal.\n\nThey can be just text on its own, or they can be associated with a dungeon floor, one of your items, or a type of potion/scroll/ring.
添加自定记录: 你可以在日志中自定记录，记下任何你想记录的东西。\n\n自定记录可以只是独立的文本，也可以是关联于地牢楼层、背包物品或是药剂/卷轴/戒指类别的文本。

ui.customnotebutton.title: ui.customnotebutton.new_text_title
Add a Custom Note: Write a title for this custom text note:

ui.customnotebutton.title: ui.customnotebutton.new_floor_prompt
Add a Custom Note: Select a floor of the dungeon to associate this note with.
添加自定记录: 选择要记录的地牢楼层

ui.customnotebutton.title: ui.customnotebutton.new_floor_title
Add a Custom Note: Write a title for this custom note for _floor %d_:
添加自定记录: 为_第%d层_的记录写上标题：

ui.customnotebutton.title: ui.customnotebutton.new_inv_prompt
添加自定记录: 选择要记录的背包物品

ui.customnotebutton.title: ui.customnotebutton.new_item_title
Add a Custom Note: Write a title for this custom note for the item:\n_%s_
添加自定记录: 为物品_%s_的记录写上标题：

ui.customnotebutton.title: ui.customnotebutton.new_type_prompt
Add a Custom Note: Select a type of item you'd like to associate this note with.
添加自定记录: 选择要记录的物品类别

ui.customnotebutton.title: ui.customnotebutton$customnotewindow.delete_warn
Add a Custom Note: Are you sure you want to delete this custom note?
添加自定记录: 你确定要删除这页记录吗？

ui.customnotebutton.title: ui.quickslotbutton.select_item
添加自定记录: 选择放入快捷栏的物品

ui.customnotebutton.title: ui.talentspane.unlock_tier2
Add a Custom Note: Reach level 6 to unlock more talents.
添加自定记录: 升到6级以解锁更多天赋

ui.customnotebutton.title: ui.talentspane.unlock_tier3
Add a Custom Note: Reach level 12 and use the item from the second boss to unlock more talents.
添加自定记录: 升到12级并使用第二个Boss的掉落物以解锁更多天赋。

ui.customnotebutton.title: ui.talentspane.unlock_tier4
Add a Custom Note: Reach level 20 and use the item from the fourth boss to unlock more talents.
添加自定记录: 升到20级并使用第四个Boss的掉落物以解锁更多天赋。

ui.customnotebutton.title: ui.toolbar.examine_prompt
Add a Custom Note: Press again to search\nPress a tile to examine
添加自定记录: 再按一遍此按钮以搜索周边；\n点选一个地格以获得其信息。

ui.customnotebutton.title: ui.updatenotification$wndupdate.desc
Add a Custom Note:
Shattered Pixel Dungeon is regularly updated with overhauls to existing game content, or entirely new content!

Game balance is also frequently improved in game updates, so that specific items/heroes/enemies aren't too strong or too weak.

Updates also include fixes for bugs and other various stability improvements.
添加自定记录:
破碎的像素地牢会时常更新以变更既有内容，或是加入新东西！

游戏平衡也会经常得到调整，维持物品、英雄、敌人强度的大致均衡。

更新还包含漏洞修复与各种稳定性提升。
